Package edu.baylor.cs.se.hibernate.services

Class ProjectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.baylor.cs.se.hibernate.services.ProjectService
  • @Transactional
@Service
public class ProjectService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service Component for Project that includes the business logic To Perform CRUD operation in Project

      • isDuplicateProjectKey

        public boolean isDuplicateProjectKey​(java.lang.String key,
                                     java.util.List<Project> projects)
        Method to check whether a key provided is already used as the key of existing project This is to ensure that two projects do not have the same key
        Parameters:
        key - , key of the new project
        projects - , list of current projects
        Returns:
        True or False based on if the key already exists
